{{cpp/filesystem/path/title|replace_filename}}
{{cpp/filesystem/path/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++17|1=
path&amp; replace_filename( const path&amp; replacement );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Replaces a single filename component with {{c|replacement}}.

Equivalent to: {{c|1=remove_filename(); return operator/=(replacement);}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|replacement|{{tt|path}} used for replacing the filename component}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|*this}}

{{cpp/impldef exception}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;filesystem&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
namespace fs = std::filesystem;

int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; fs::path("/foo").replace_filename("bar") &lt;&lt; '\n'
              &lt;&lt; fs::path("/").replace_filename("bar") &lt;&lt; '\n'
              &lt;&lt; fs::path("").replace_filename("pub") &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
"/bar"
"/bar"
"pub"
}}
